verses.verse: In thee, O LORD, <WH3068> do I put my trust: <WH2620> let me never <WH408> <WH5769> be put to confusion. <WH954>
Deliver <WH5337> me in thy righteousness, <WH6666> and cause me to escape: <WH6403> incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> unto <WH413> me, and save <WH3467> me.

Be <WH1961> thou my strong <WH6697> habitation, <WH4583> whereunto I may continually <WH8548> resort: <WH935> thou hast given commandment <WH6680> to save <WH3467> me; for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art my rock <WH5553> and my fortress. <WH4686>
Deliver <WH6403> me, O my God, <WH430> out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of the wicked, <WH7563> out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3709> of the unrighteous <WH5765> and cruel <WH2556> man.
For <WH3588> thou <WH859> art my hope, <WH8615> O Lord <WH136> GOD: <WH3069> thou art my trust <WH4009> from my youth. <WH4480> <WH5271>

By <WH5921> thee have I been holden up <WH5564> from the womb: <WH4480> <WH990> thou <WH859> art he that took <WH1491> me out of my mother's <WH517> bowels: <WH4480> <WH4578> my praise <WH8416> shall be continually <WH8548> of thee.
I am <WH1961> as a wonder <WH4159> unto many; <WH7227> but thou <WH859> art my strong <WH5797> refuge. <WH4268>
Let my mouth <WH6310> be filled <WH4390> with thy praise <WH8416> and with thy honor <WH8597> all <WH3605> the day. <WH3117>
Cast me not off <WH7993> <WH408> in the time <WH6256> of old age; <WH2209> forsake <WH5800> me not <WH408> when my strength <WH3581> faileth. <WH3615>
For <WH3588> mine enemies <WH341> speak <WH559> against me; and they that lay wait for <WH8104> my soul <WH5315> take counsel <WH3289> together, <WH3162>
Saying, <WH559> God <WH430> hath forsaken <WH5800> him: persecute <WH7291> and take <WH8610> him; for <WH3588> there is none <WH369> to deliver <WH5337> him.
O God, <WH430> be not <WH408> far <WH7368> from <WH4480> me: O my God, <WH430> make haste <WH2439> for my help. <WH5833>

Let them be confounded <WH954> and consumed <WH3615> that are adversaries <WH7853> to my soul; <WH5315> let them be covered <WH5844> with reproach <WH2781> and dishonor <WH3639> that seek <WH1245> my hurt. <WH7451>
But I <WH589> will hope <WH3176> continually, <WH8548> and will yet praise <WH8416> thee more and more. <WH3254>

My mouth <WH6310> shall show forth <WH5608> thy righteousness <WH6666> and thy salvation <WH8668> all <WH3605> the day; <WH3117> for <WH3588> I know <WH3045> not <WH3808> the numbers <WH5615> thereof.
I will go <WH935> in the strength <WH1369> of the Lord <WH136> GOD: <WH3069> I will make mention <WH2142> of thy righteousness, <WH6666> even of thine only. <WH905>
O God, <WH430> thou hast taught <WH3925> me from my youth: <WH4480> <WH5271> and hitherto <WH5704> <WH2008> have I declared <WH5046> thy wondrous works. <WH6381>

Now also <WH1571> when <WH5704> I am old <WH2209> and grayheaded, <WH7872> O God, <WH430> forsake <WH5800> me not; <WH408> until <WH5704> I have showed <WH5046> thy strength <WH2220> unto this generation, <WH1755> and thy power <WH1369> to every one <WH3605> that is to come. <WH935>
Thy righteousness <WH6666> also, O God, <WH430> is very <WH5704> high, <WH4791> who <WH834> hast done <WH6213> great things: <WH1419> O God, <WH430> who <WH4310> is like unto thee! <WH3644>

Thou, which <WH834> hast showed <WH7200> me great <WH7227> and sore <WH7451> troubles, <WH6869> shalt quicken <WH2421> me again, <WH7725> and shalt bring me up <WH5927> again <WH7725> from the depths <WH4480> <WH8415> of the earth. <WH776>
Thou shalt increase <WH7235> my greatness, <WH1420> and comfort <WH5162> me on every side. <WH5437>

I <WH589> will also <WH1571> praise <WH3034> thee with the psaltery, <WH3627> <WH5035> even thy truth, <WH571> O my God: <WH430> unto thee will I sing <WH2167> with the harp, <WH3658> O thou Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>
My lips <WH8193> shall greatly rejoice <WH7442> when <WH3588> I sing <WH2167> unto thee; and my soul, <WH5315> which <WH834> thou hast redeemed. <WH6299>

My tongue <WH3956> also <WH1571> shall talk <WH1897> of thy righteousness <WH6666> all <WH3605> the day <WH3117> long: for <WH3588> they are confounded, <WH954> for <WH3588> they are brought unto shame, <WH2659> that seek <WH1245> my hurt. <WH7451>
